name: I Will Find Them
description:
This is a small "point and click"-game, where you have to find the Mayors missing daughter. The game is a bit early access, so do expect some bugs, and there is no way too skip dialog or save the game. If you need to quit the game, then press ALT+F4. 

Sound is an important part of this game. I recommend playing it with headphones.

The controls is WASD and the mouse.

Good luck and have fun.

The game was made for the game jam "I Can't write but want to tell a story"
